Member Function Documentation

virtual BOOLEAN SimpleAudioDevice::Disable (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Stop an audio device. If you specified TRUE for suspend_all_others when you called Enable(), then any sounds that were suspended at that time will now be resumed.

Parameters:
audio_device_reference The reference previsouly obtained from Enable.
Returns:
Whether the device was successfully disabled. The AudioDeviceStatusMsg APOXI message is also sent in case of success for speech and FM radio devices

Implemented in RadioAudioDevice, and SpeechSimpleAudioDevice.

virtual BOOLEAN SimpleAudioDevice::Enable (  BOOLEAN  suspend_all_others = FALSE  )  [pure virtual]
 

Start the device.

Parameters:
suspend_all_others Whether all other sounds should be suspended (or stopped, if they can not be suspended).
Returns:
A reference to the active device. Use this when calling Disable(). The AudioDeviceStatusMsg APOXI message is also sent in case of success for speech and FM radio devices

Implemented in RadioAudioDevice, and SpeechSimpleAudioDevice.
